sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of United Technologies Corp ( UTX ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.1%.
Year to date, United Technologies Corp registers a 6.3% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Apple ( AAPL ), trading down 0.2%.
Apple is showing a gain of 39.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Verizon Communications ( VZ ), trading down 0.2%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
